医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的成像方法可能彻底改变乳腺癌检测根据今天发表在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 杂志《放射学：癌症成像》上的一项研究，一种创新的乳腺成像技术为检测癌症提供了高灵敏度，同时显着降低了假阳性结果的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/New-imaging-approach-could-revolutionize-breast-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/New-imaging-approach-could-revolutionize-breast-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb3c87d0-a1b5-4f60-a1d2-2906dec53392 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 21:03:43 -0500 New imaging approach could revolutionize breast cancer detection
Rucaparib 及其主要代谢物表现出不同的生物活性和协同作用一旦进入体内，药物除了发挥治疗功能外，还会通过代谢机制的作用进行生化转化，这一过程有利于药物的排出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Rucaparib-and-its-major-metabolite-exhibit- Differential-biological-activity-and-synergy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Rucaparib-and-its-major-metabolite-exhibit- Differential-biological-activity-and-synergy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=495aa031-2a0a-4d8a-9436-9aea6089dbdf Fri, 09 Feb 2024 20:54:39 -0500 Rucaparib and its major metabolite exhibit differential biological activity and synergy
科罗拉多儿童医院宣布加入儿科心脏网络科罗拉多儿童医院 (Children's Colorado) 宣布最近加入儿科心脏网络 (PHN)，该网络由领先的医院组成，致力于改善患有心脏病的儿童（以及最近的成人）的治疗结果和生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Childrens-Colorado-announces-its-recent-acceptance-into-the-Pediatric-Heart-Network.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Childrens-Colorado-announces-its-recent-acceptance-into-the-Pediatric-Heart-Network.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8739001-d7c8-4631-94ce-59317ffcba47 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 20:42:00 -0500 Children's Colorado announces its acceptance into the Pediatric Heart Network
杀菌剂耐药性：对人类、动物和植物健康的全球威胁真菌可引起人类、动物和植物疾病。每年有 150 万人死于真菌感染，而粮食作物的真菌侵袭威胁着粮食生产。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Fungicide-resistance-A-global-threat-to- human-animal-and-plant-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Fungicide-resistance-A-global-threat-to- human-animal-and-plant-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d665714c-1d84-4987-8d0d-68fb9e658a37 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 20:38:12 -0500 Fungicide resistance: A global threat to human, animal, and plant health
LSHTM 研究人员获得 200 万英镑资金用于开发新型疫苗、诊断和治疗方法伦敦卫生与热带医学院 (LSHTM) 的研究人员通过英国研究与创新 (UKRI) 技术任务基金获得了 200 万英镑的资金，用于开发新型疫苗、诊断方法和治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/LSHTM-researchers-receive-c2a32m-funding-to-develop-novel-vaccines-diagnostics-and-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/LSHTM-researchers-receive-c2a32m-funding-to-develop-novel-vaccines-diagnostics-and-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd36056b-9c60-4107-a108-bc7ec68df82a Fri, 09 Feb 2024 15:16:03 -0500 LSHTM researchers receive £2m funding to develop novel vaccines, diagnostics and therapeutics
人工智能工具绘制肿瘤中的蛋白质功能，为个性化癌症治疗铺平道路科学家们开发了一种新的人工智能工具，可以绘制癌性肿瘤中蛋白质的功能图谱，使临床医生能够决定如何以更精确的方式进行针对性治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/AI-tool-maps- Protein-function-in-tumors-paving-way-for-personalized-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/AI-tool-maps- Protein-function-in-tumors-paving-way-for-personalized-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4cb7ae8-0f19-4e67-abdb-8f5c90ab1dcc Fri, 09 Feb 2024 15:12:19 -0500 AI tool maps protein function in tumors, paving way for personalized cancer treatment
发现滴滴涕暴露会改变人类精子表观基因组来自麦吉尔大学、比勒陀利亚大学、拉瓦尔大学、奥尔胡斯大学和哥本哈根大学的研究人员在一项表明人类现在和后代潜在的生殖和健康并发症的研究中得出结论，接触环境毒素的父亲，尤其是滴滴涕，可能会产生对孩子健康产生影响的精子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/DDT-exposure-found-to-alter-sperm-epigenome-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/DDT-exposure-found-to-alter-sperm-epigenome-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33b19d12-9dfe-48f3-83e3-7bc087d8d644 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 14:54:34 -0500 DDT exposure found to alter sperm epigenome in humans
CARB-X 向 Visby Medical 授予 180 万美元，用于开发便携式淋病快速 PCR 检测抗击抗生素耐药细菌生物制药加速器 (CARB-X) 将向生物技术公司 Visby Medical 提供高达 180 万美元的资金，用于开发便携式快速聚合酶链反应 (PCR) 诊断仪，以检测是否存在导致淋病奈瑟菌的病原体淋病 (NG) 及其对环丙沙星的敏感性，环丙沙星是一种前线口服抗生素，现已无法治疗耐药性 NG。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/CARB-X-awards-2418-million-to-Visby-Medical-to-develop-a-portable-rapid-PCR-test-for-淋病。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/CARB-X-awards-2418-million-to-Visby-Medical-to-develop-a-portable-rapid-PCR-test-for-淋病。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a52ba302-3d38-4ace-864a-8a997f3b2f59 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 14:23:02 -0500 CARB-X awards $1.8 million to Visby Medical to develop a portable rapid PCR test for gonorrhea
研究探讨与心理治疗相关的不良反应除药物治疗外，心理治疗是治疗和康复各种精神健康障碍的重要循证方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-explores-adverse-effects- Associated-with-psychotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-explores-adverse-effects-linked-with-psychotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=daa3665d-be13-4cf5-8fff-d60b8eb5e550 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 14:18:00 -0500 Study explores adverse effects associated with psychotherapy
了解 BIOne 250：适合微生物应用的经济型生物过程控制站Distek, Inc. 是 48 年来实验室制药仪器领域的领导者，自豪地推出专为微生物应用而设计的 BIOne 250 生物过程控制器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Discover-the-BIOne-250-A-Budget-Friendly-Bioprocess-Control-Station-for-Microbial-Applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Discover-the-BIOne-250-A-Budget-Friendly-Bioprocess-Control-Station-for-Microbial-Applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f6433eb-e848-4442-9591-5d0a3c8aa240 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 11:17:00 -0500 Discover the BIOne 250: A Budget Friendly Bioprocess Control Station for Microbial Applications
